articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.title: Nothing Phone 3A Lite strips the Glyph Lights down to the bare minimum - The Verge
articles.description: Nothing’s new Phone 3A Lite is a budget-friendly model destined for the UK and Europe, but its single notification LED won’t be launching in the US.
articles.content: The single LED is inspired by classic notification lights. The single LED is inspired by classic notification lights. by Dominic PrestonClose Dominic Preston… [+3554 chars]
